name: JAMBALL
description:
Jamball is a local multiplayer game in which two players play football but use jam propulsion to get around the pitch.

If jam lands on the pitch, it'll create a sticky surface that'll slow down anything that attempts to roll over it, this can be used to your advantage but later in the game you may find that you'll regret jamming so much as it gets harder to move around the pitch.

When this sport was first invented the abilities stopped there but after decades of constant complaints from viewers saying that the game was slow we decided to invent the 'Jamplosion'. A player can charge this and launch the ball; it's often possible to chip the ball over the trails of jam allowing it to quickly travel along the pitch.
